def candies(s):
    return sum([max(s) - x for x in s]) if len(s) > 1 else -1

def candies(s):
    return max(s) * len(s) - sum(s) if len(s) > 1 else -1

def candies(s):
    return sum([max(s)-i for i in s]) if len(s) > 1 else -1

def candies(s):
    return -1 if len(s) < 2 else len(s) * max(s) - sum(s)
